HomePage.title: NIHONGO-AI. AI makes the world of Nihongo more interesting.
HomePage.description: It is a new platform for Japanese language learners, Japanese educators, and everyone who loves Japan to overcome language barriers and lead you to the depths of culture.
HomePage.metaDescription: It is a new platform for Japanese language learners, Japanese educators, and everyone who loves Japan to overcome language barriers and lead you to the depths of culture.

HeroPage.description: To Japanese language learners, Japanese educators, and everyone who loves Japan. It is a new platform that transcends language barriers and leads you to the depths of culture.
HeroPage.checkWebappButton: Get started with the web app

FeaturesPage.feature1Paragraph: Learn more freely and smarter. Personalize according to your purpose and level. AI will support you smartly. (Functions for learners, educators, and educational institutions will be implemented one after another)
FeaturesPage.feature2Paragraph: Digging deeper into "real Japanese" and "living Japan culture". From fun knowledge for learners to expert insights for educators, you'll find information that can only be found here. It is also ideal as a Japanese teaching material. (Various useful functions will be implemented one after another)
FeaturesPage.feature3Paragraph: Developers are happy to hear from users directly. Your voice will accelerate the evolution of NIHONGO-AI. Let's create a better platform together.

VideoPage.paragraph: No problem even if you are not good at IT! Let's use it while watching the video!

AboutPage.description: It is a new platform for Japanese language learners, Japanese educators, and everyone who loves Japan to overcome language barriers and lead you to the depths of culture.

sectionOne.title: Modern Japanese x State-of-the-art Technology
sectionOne.paragraph: Learning Japanese leads to enjoying Japan as a whole. Teaching the Japanese language leads to conveying Japan as a whole to the world. We will provide you with such an experience.

item1.title: For Japanese learners
item1.issue1: "I want to learn in a fun and effective way."
item1.issue2: "I want to know realistic expressions that are not found in textbooks."
item1.solution: → AI-powered web app to become a learning companion for your level. In the blog, you can learn interesting Japanese and cultural knowledge that you can use immediately.

item2.title: To Japanese Educators
item2.issue1: "I want to teach young people the language and native expressions."
item2.issue2: "I want materials and tools that are attractive to students."
item2.solution: → Enrich your education with AI-powered web apps that can be used directly in the classroom and blog posts that cut into issues in the field.

item3.title: To everyone who likes Japan
item3.issue1: "I want to have a deep understanding of the background of anime and culture."
item3.issue2: "I want to enjoy my travel more wholeheartedly."
item3.solution: → From cultural commentary that makes anime 10 times more interesting, to useful features that are useful when traveling. Deepen your "love" even further.

sectionDeveloper.paragraph: Details of the developer of this site
sectionDeveloper.developer1Paragraph: Obtained a Japanese teacher qualification and experience teaching Japanese to foreigners at a Japanese language school or preparatory school
sectionDeveloper.developer2Paragraph: As a Saitama Goodwill Ambassador and rickshaw driver, he has a passion for conveying the charm of Japan culture
sectionDeveloper.developer3Paragraph: Majored in natural language processing at the Graduate School of Information Engineering, and worked as a data scientist using AI technology
sectionDeveloper.developer4Paragraph: Japanese is my mother tongue. English and Chinese are business level. Korean and Taiwanese are at a conversational level. Experience the fun and difficulty of learning a foreign language

AboutPage.metaDescription: To Japanese language learners, Japanese educators, and everyone who loves Japan. It is a new platform that transcends language barriers and leads you to the depths of culture.

TestimonialsPage.title: Testimonials
TestimonialsPage.paragraph: Let us know what you think and what you want. It's an encouragement for developers!

testimonial1.name: Maggie
testimonial1.content: I was stuck in self-study, but the culture column on my blog is also interesting and motivates me to learn.

testimonial2.name: Sato
testimonial2.content: I use the blog posts as they are for my classes. The response of the students is also outstanding. Here are the real teaching materials that I have been struggling to find in the past.

testimonial3.name: Mehdi
testimonial3.content: Without the explanation in the blog post, I got a glimpse of the abyss of Japan culture and the recent situation in Japan from one scene of anime that I would have passed through, and my interest in Japan became even stronger.
